title: Opinion: Rise of anti-science rhetoric has fundamentally changed the relationship between doctors and patients
description: “The rise of anti-science and anti-vaccine rhetoric has fundamentally changed the relationship between clinicians and patients.”
content: “The rise of anti-science and anti-vaccine rhetoric has fundamentally changed the relationship between clinicians and patients.”
